ï»¿She's the woman who gives Uber executives sleepless nights.
Jean Liu is president of China's number one ride-sharing service, Didi Chuxing,...
...born in 1978, Harvard-educated, and already best buds with Tim Cook.
Apple is sinking 1 billion dollars into her firm,...
...one of its biggest outside investments ever.
With 300 million users in more than 400 cities,...
...Didi is unparalleled in China, some 11 million rides per day.
Second place Uber doesn't even come close there.
And Apple isn't the only one investing.
Lyft, Tencent and Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba are also partners.
